citations.narrative:
The facility has not documented its annual contingency plan review for the 2024 calendar year. While the facility
representative stated the annual review was conducted in 2024, the last date notated in their records was May 3rd, 2023.
The licensee was unable to provide any alternative records to support the annual review being conducted since this date.
Reviewing the outlined plan in place ensures the facility has assessed the current plan for any needed amendments to
better prepare for unexpected disasters or events, as well as a detailed strategy to address instructions for, but not limited
to: animal evacuation, sheltering-in-place, and backup provisions for husbandry and food/watering supplies, sanitation,
and ventilation. The facility shall develop and document an appropriate contingency plan available for review upon USDA
inspections.
Correct by September 10, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The facility has not documented its annual contingency plan review for the 2024 calendar year. While the facility 
representative stated the annual review was conducted in 2024, the last date notated in their records was May 3rd, 2023. 
The licensee was unable to provide any alternative records to support the annual review being conducted since this date. 
Reviewing the outlined plan in place ensures the facility has assessed the current plan for any needed amendments to 
better prepare for unexpected disasters or events, as well as a detailed strategy to address instructions for, but not limited 
to: animal evacuation, sheltering-in-place, and backup provisions for husbandry and food/watering supplies, sanitation, 
and ventilation. The facility shall develop and document an appropriate contingency plan available for review upon USDA 
inspections. 
Correct by September 10, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
